citeinfo.origin: National Climatic Data Center (NCDC), National Environmental Satellite, Data and Information Service (NESDIS), National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)
citeinfo.title: Monthly Mean Normal Charts of Temperature for the Northern Hemisphere (1921-1950)

abstract.p: Publication Title: Monthly mean surface temperature anomaly charts for the Northern Hemisphere (1921-1950) (pub.1963).

Contains unsummarized surface data, including monthly mean normal charts of temperature at sea level; charts and tables of monthly mean temperature anomalies (1921-1950); and a list of stations, with latitude, longitude, and elevation.
Available from the NOAA Library System: URL http://www.lib.noaa.gov/.

descript.purpose: This publication is in the National Climatic Data Center's Foreign Data Library, and is one of many books, atlases, maps, charts and other printed materials received by the NCDC from many nations over the years.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
